custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User taps onMore Tab 
AND User taps on Photo Creator (Face Scan Used) menu option
custom_steps_separated.expected:
If first time for the user there will be camera permissions. 
Otherwise the camera is shown with Snap Lenses.
The camera is shown with Snap Lenses.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks on a lens
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Lens affect is displayed on the screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks on the close button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User is returned to settings screen and tab navigation bar is restored

title: Snap Photo Saved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User taps on More Tab
AND User taps on Photo Creator (Face Scan Used) menu option
AND a Snap Lens is available

custom_steps_separated.expected: Photo is taken and shown to the user.
The image is saved to the photo library and an alert is shown to the user with success.
The share sheet will appear with places to share the image.

custom_steps_separated.content: Share the photo with one of the share sheet apps.

title: Snap Video Saved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User taps on More Tab
AND User taps on Photo Creator (Face Scan Used) menu option
AND a Snap Lens is available

custom_steps_separated.content: Press and hold the lens button.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The round button will have a border line appear as it goes around. 
While this is happening a video is being recored of the user.
The video is saved to the photo library and an alert is shown to the user with success.
The share sheet will appear with places to share the video.

custom_steps_separated.content: Share the photo with one of the share sheet apps.
